title: Judging the MLB trade deadline -- one month later
content: A look at where all 30 teams stand ahead of the final stretch -- and if their deadline deals have actually paid off.

title: Report: Clippers skirted cap with Kawhi payment
content: The Clippers reportedly have been accused of circumventing the NBA's salary cap by paying $28 million to Kawhi Leonard for a "no-show job."

title: FSU player was shot in back of head, father says
content: Florida State's Ethan Pritchard was shot in the back of the head Sunday night, his father said, and remains in stable condition at Tallahassee Memorial Hospital.

title: FIFA to use dynamic pricing for World Cup tickets
content: FIFA has unveiled the first steps in the ticketing process for next year's World Cup, one that will use dynamic pricing based on demand.

title: Open season: Bettors flocking to Cowboys-Eagles
content: The NFL opener regularly turns into one of the most heavily bet regular-season games of the entire year, and Thursday's Cowboys-Eagles matchup is no exception.

title: Sources: Jets fear Vera-Tucker will miss season
content: The Jets fear that starting right guard Alijah Vera-Tucker suffered a season-ending torn triceps during Tuesday's practice, sources told ESPN.

title: Valdez apologizes after crossing up Astros catcher
content: Astros starter Framber Valdez said he apologized to catcher Cesar Salazar after hitting him in the chest with a pitch Tuesday night, but the left-hander insisted it wasn't intentional.

title: DeBoer: Tide can still do 'some big things' in '25
content: Coach Kalen DeBoer believes Alabama can still do "some big things" this season, despite the Crimson Tide's season-opening loss to then-unranked Florida State.

title: Mavs' Washington agrees to four-year, $90M deal
content: Mavericks forward P.J. Washington has agreed to a four-year, $90 million contract extension, per his agent, Kevin Bradbury of Lift Sports Management. The deal keeps Washington, 27, in Dallas through 2029-30.

title: 14 teams that will make the NFL playoffs -- and six that will be left out: Barnwell’s preseason picks
content: Which teams from last season's playoffs will return? Who will be the surprises in the 14-team bracket? And who will win the Super Bowl?

title: Bold predictions, strengths and concerns for all 32 teams
content: Here's everything you need to know ahead of the NFL regular season, including how teams rank before Week 1.

title: 'I'm going to be that person:' Eagles' A.J. Brown wants more for himself, and for others
content: All indications point to Brown being "hungrier than ever," as the Eagles begin to defend their title.

title: How the relationship between Parsons and the Cowboys broke down
content: The disputed nature of a March meeting with Jerry Jones charted a course for Micah Parsons' exit from Dallas.

title: USMNT transfer grades: Analyzing every American move in the summer window
content: A bunch of USMNT players have been on the move. Let's grade them all, from Matt Turner to Gio Reyna and everyone in between ahead of the 2026 World Cup.

title: The 11 biggest questions heading into fantasy Week 1
content: How the Bears' offense will look, TreVeyon Henderson's role and Travis Hunter's snap count are among the curiosities.

title: Matchup rankings: Chase Brown, Emeka Egbuka stand out in Week 1
content: Here are the most and least favorable matchups at quarterback, running back, wide receiver and tight end.

title: LeBron, Kobe and the scars that led to Redeem Team gold in 2008
content: Following a disappointing bronze medal in the 2004 Olympics, the 2008 Team USA roster was out for redemption.

title: Can you import an entire offense? OU hopes so with John Mateer, Ben Arbuckle
content: OU is the latest team to bring in a new playcaller and QB to boost offense. The Sooners need big things from Mateer and Arbuckle.

title: From walk-offs to blowouts to ... did that really just happen?! All of the ways the Rockies have lost games in 2025
content: Colorado has lost games in practically every way imaginable this season. We look back on how the team reached 100 losses.

title: AP Week 1 poll reaction: What's next for each Top 25 team
content: College football came back in a big way this past weekend, with high-profile matchups and some surprise scores. Now it's time to look forward for the country's best teams.

title: Latest rosters for 90+ men's college basketball teams: Transfers, recruits, more
content: Players leaving. Players joining. We're updating key rosters as players arrive on campus for the 2025-26 season.

title: Five months from Olympics, here's what you should know about Team USA men's hockey
content: Will Matthew Tkachuk be healthy enough to play? Can Tage Thompson crack the lineup? We look at some of the biggest topics coming out of the recent orientation camp.

title: Worst transfers of the window, ranked: From Cunha to Isak, 13 big moves that might fail
content: This summer transfer window had its share of good moves, but we're ranking the 13 worst ones. Did Man United, Liverpool and Arsenal mess up?

title: How did Liverpool afford their $600 million summer of spending?
content: Liverpool won the Premier League title last season but went on a spending spree. Why? And how did they do it?

title: WSL preview: Chelsea, City, Arsenal to fight for title? Liverpool, Spurs in danger?
content: Chelsea have won the last six WSL titles, but will they focus on UWCL glory? How will promoted London City do? And could Liverpool, Spurs drop down?

title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United still open to Onana exit
content: Manchester United's André Onana could still leave the club in the next few weeks. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: Italian Grand Prix at Monza: All the times, stats and facts to know
content: Formula 1 heads to Monza, the Temple of Speed and home of Ferrari for round 16 of the 2025 season. Find out the stats, session times and latest news.

title: Weekly pickups: Jonah Tong, Payton Tolle lead fantasy playoff picks
content: The players you should claim off the waiver wire, including some pitchers to help you in the fantasy playoffs.

title: GST rate cuts! What is cheaper & dearer? Check full list of items in each slab
content: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman announced significant GST rate cuts, effective September 22, bringing relief to the common man. Daily use items like hair oil, soaps, and toothpaste now fall under the 5% tax bracket. Several items, including ultra-high temperature milk and paneer, face zero tax. Air conditioners, TVs, and small cars are now taxed at 18%.

title: Major GST reforms: 0% levy on Indian breads, paneer and milk
content: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman announced significant GST rate cuts following the 56th GST Council meeting, implementing a two-tier structure of 5% and 18% effective September 22. The rate rationalization, supported by all states, aims to benefit the common man by consolidating rates and reallocating items across tax slabs.

title: Special GST slab of 40%: Which items are under this new tax category
content: The GST Council has approved a new 40% tax slab for sin and luxury goods, set to replace the existing cess. While the implementation date is pending, 5% and 18% slabs take effect from September 22. Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman announced the move, highlighting reduced tax burdens for the common person.

title: 'Common man to benefit': PM Modi hails GST rate cuts; calls it wide-ranging reform
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi announced next-generation GST reforms. These reforms aim to improve citizens' lives and ease business operations. The GST Council agreed to rate cuts and reforms proposed by the Union Government. Nirmala Sitharaman announced major GST rate cuts, implementing a two-tier tax system. Common man and middle-class items will see reduced rates.

title: Amazon's cost-cutting rule: New phone policy; staff must report personal usage
content: Amazon is now requiring employees to meticulously report the percentage of work-related usage on their company phones. This is to adjust their $50 monthly reimbursements proportionally, based on personal use. This phone monitoring is part of broader cost-cutting measures under CEO Andy Jassy's "hardcore culture reset," leading to employee frustration and anxiety about job security.

title: Google’s ‘Preferred sources’ in Search: How to add Times of India
content: Google introduced a new feature called 'Preferred sources' on August 12, 2025, initially in India and the US (English). This allows users to select trusted news outlets, like Times of India, to see more of their coverage in Top stories and a 'From your sources' section.

title: Hockey Asia Cup: India settle for 2-2 draw against South Korea in Super 4s match in Rajgir
content: India faced a disappointing start in the Super4s stage of the Asia Cup, drawing 2-2 with South Korea after leading early. Despite Hardik Singh's initial goal, South Korea surged ahead with two quick goals. Harmanpreet Singh's late assist to Mandeep Singh salvaged a draw, but India's poor finishing and missed penalty corners highlighted a lackluster performance.

title: ‘Not hundreds of thousands’: Musk’s daughter says she’s broke; opens up on fame, father
content: Vivian Wilson, Elon Musk's daughter, asserts her financial independence despite her father's wealth, sharing that she lives with roommates to save money. The aspiring model, who recently graced Teen Vogue, navigates newfound fame while striving to be recognized beyond her family connections. Wilson, who cut ties with Musk in 2022, aims to establish her own identity.

title: Op Sindoor: Army's new video sets record straight on ceasefire - watch
content: The Army released a video showcasing Operation Sindoor, which involved precision strikes on terror sites in Pakistan following the Pahalgam attack that killed 26 civilians. The operation targeted nine terror sites in Pakistan-occupied Kashmir, eliminating over 100 terrorists. A ceasefire was declared after communication between the Indian and Pakistani DGMOs, following an announcement by then US President Donald Trump.

title: The 50% misfire: How Trump made Russian oil cheaper for India - And Putin a winner
content: President Trump's tariff hike on Indian goods, intended to curb Russian oil purchases, backfired. Russia lowered prices, enticing India to resume buying, while China increased its intake of Russian crude. Consequently, Russian oil is more entrenched in Asia, strengthening black market networks and driving India, Russia, and China closer together, undermining the intended pressure on Moscow.

title: Youngest woman billionaire on leaving college; parents reaction; money lessons
content: Lucy Guo, the youngest self-made billionaire, attributes her success to her frugal upbringing and early entrepreneurial spirit. Despite disappointing her immigrant parents by dropping out of Carnegie Mellon, she pursued the Thiel Fellowship and founded successful ventures like Scale AI and Passes.

title: 'Let Zelenskyy come to Moscow': Putin on Trump's trilateral peace meet proposal
content: Amidst ongoing conflict, Russian President Vladimir Putin expressed openness to a trilateral peace initiative with US President Donald Trump and Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy, proposing Moscow as the venue. However, Ukraine swiftly rejected this, deeming it a cynical ploy.

title: Xi's 'anti-American party': How bullies lose friends - Just ask Trump
content: Xi Jinping is positioning China as the anchor of global stability, capitalizing on Trump's confrontational foreign policy that has alienated allies and emboldened rivals. This shift is evident in China's growing convening power, attracting nations once aligned with the West. While not yet a new world order, China's rise offers a multi-aligned alternative, challenging US dominance and reshaping global governance.

title: Justin Jefferson, Suni Lee spotted at Minnesota State Fair
content: The Minnesota State Fair became a celebrity hotspot when Vikings' Justin Jefferson and Olympic gymnast Sunisa Lee were spotted together, igniting social media. Lee shared a photo on Instagram, quickly turning the internet into a commentary section, with fans dubbing them "Minnesota royalty." This surprise crossover highlighted the pride and excitement surrounding these two homegrown stars.

title: Swift’s past interview has fans saying she manifested Kelce
content: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce's engagement has fans revisiting a 2012 interview where Swift detailed her vision of love and marriage. Her past words about prioritizing mutual dreams and open communication resonate deeply with her current relationship. Fans are celebrating how her teenage ideals seem to be aligning with her real-life romance with the Kansas City Chiefs star.

title: Gabrielle Union stuns in white dress on anniversary getaway
content: Dwyane Wade and Gabrielle Union-Wade celebrated their 11th wedding anniversary, sharing glimpses of their beach vacation on social media. Union reposted a photo of herself in front of a vibrant graffiti wall from Wade's Instagram post. The couple, despite initial skepticism from Wade's family due to their age gap, now enjoy a strong bond and family acceptance.

title: 'Predictability has huge premium': EAM on India-Germany ties amid Trump tariff war
content: External Affairs Minister Jaishankar emphasized the importance of predictability in global politics amidst shifting relations with China and US tariffs. He highlighted the need for closer collaboration between India, the EU, and Germany due to global strategic and economic volatility. Wadephul stressed the Western nations' desire for peace in Ukraine, noting Russia's unwillingness to negotiate despite efforts.

title: Indore hospital rat infestation: Second newborn girl dies
content: In a tragic turn of events, a newborn girl, already weakened by congenital anomalies and abandoned by her parents, died in an Indore hospital after being bitten by rats.

title: Painted as 'terrorists': Afghan refugees expelled from Pakistan, despite deadly quake
content: Pakistan is forcing out thousands of registered Afghan refugees amidst a humanitarian crisis in Afghanistan, triggered by a recent devastating earthquake. Despite holding official UN registration, families are fleeing due to fear of arrest and harassment, exacerbating the challenges faced by a nation already grappling with immense loss and destruction.

title: Insulated from Trump's tariffs: Companies target small towns for growth; here’s why
content: Indian companies are strategically targeting rural markets to sustain growth amidst challenges posed by substantial US tariffs. Companies across various sectors are reporting strong rural consumer demand, fueled by stable prices and anticipated good harvests.

title: 'Not just optics': EU diplomat says Xi-Putin-Kim meet a bid for 'new world order'
content: A Beijing parade featuring Xi Jinping alongside Putin and Kim Jong Un has sparked EU criticism, with concerns raised about a challenge to the Western-led global order. The event, marking the end of World War II, showcased China's military might and growing ambitions. Trump accused the leaders of conspiring against the US, while the Kremlin dismissed the claims.

title: Hookah controversy! Irfan Pathan tags MS Dhoni, says 'sath baith kar pienge'
content: Irfan Pathan is facing renewed scrutiny after an old interview clip suggesting MS Dhoni's hookah habits and alleged favoritism resurfaced, sparking online debate. A fan questioned Pathan about the claims on Mohammed Shami's birthday post. Pathan responded humorously, tagging Dhoni and saying they would enjoy hookah together.

title: Leonard tied to scam deal: Fraud company exposed; 'No-show' promo sparks outrage
content: Kawhi Leonard, who joined the Clippers in 2019, is now linked to a fraudulent tree-planting company, Aspiration, allegedly funded by Steve Ballmer. Leonard reportedly signed a $28 million "no-show job" endorsement deal with Aspiration through KL2 Aspire LLC. The Clippers deny circumventing the salary cap, while Aspiration is under U.S. government investigation.

title: Rule forever? What Putin, Xi hot-mic moment revealed
content: A hot-mic moment captured Russian President Vladimir Putin and Chinese President Xi Jinping discussing biotechnology's potential to extend human life, possibly up to 150 years, with North Korean President Kim Jong Un observing. The exchange occurred during a military parade in Beijing, where Xi warned of a global crossroads between peace and war while showcasing China's military strength.

title: Hookah storm! Irfan Pathan breaks silence after Dhoni video controversy; comments on 'PR lobby'
content: After an old video of an Irfan Pathan interview resurfaced on social media and resulted in a massive speculation and debate on the way MS Dhoni managed the dressing room, Pathan himself has come forward to address the same. The former India all-rounder explained that his comments are being twisted and taken in a different context than intended, that too, half-a-decade after it came out.

title: 'Shown in a bad light': Bubba defends as Nick Hogan sues over Hulk Hogan doc
content: Bubba the Love Sponge is pushing back against a lawsuit filed by Nick Hogan aimed at halting the premiere of a Hulk Hogan documentary. Bubba claims he has no ownership or control over the film and believes Nick is misdirecting his legal efforts. He insists the documentary portrays Hulk Hogan favorably, highlighting his victimhood rather than casting blame.

title: GST relief: Footwear to get cheaper? Rate on apparels priced up to Rs 2,500 cut to 5%
content: The GST Council is expected to approve significant tax rate changes for footwear and apparel, potentially reducing the tax burden on consumers. Items priced up to Rs 2,500 may fall under the 5% GST slab. The council also intends to eliminate the 12% and 28% slabs, streamlining the tax structure and promoting economic transparency.

title: 'Double standards': Tejashwi digs up PM's remarks amid mother 'abuse' row
content: Tejashwi Yadav has strongly criticized PM Modi, accusing him of hypocrisy in the mother 'abuse' row, citing past controversial remarks. Yadav highlighted Modi's comments about Nitish Kumar's "DNA" and his campaigning for rape accused Prajwal Revanna.

title: GST meet: What will become cheaper after rate cuts? Top things to expect
content: The 56th GST Council meeting, presided over by Nirmala Sitharaman, is set to introduce significant changes to India's indirect taxation framework. The council is considering consolidating GST rates, potentially eliminating the 12% and 28% categories, and shifting items to 5% or 18% brackets.

title: Rain batters north India: Scores dead; roads flooded, schools shut
content: North India is facing severe hardship due to continuous rains. Rivers are overflowing, disrupting travel and forcing school closures. The India Meteorological Department issued red alerts for several regions. Punjab is experiencing its worst floods since 1988. Himachal Pradesh declared itself a disaster-affected state. Rescue operations are underway in Jammu and Kashmir.

title: Bronco or Yo-Yo: Fitness takes centre stage in Indian cricket, but is it sustainable?
content: The associations earlier followed a mark of 16.5 as cut-off for yo-yo but showed leniency by selecting even those who posted 14 as, unlike the Virat Kohli-Ravi Shastri era, there was no strict directive from the Indian cricket board. Compared to the world standards, India's Yo-Yo marker wasn't stiff but even then plenty of superstars found it difficult to pass the assessment between what became the dreaded cones in Indian cricket.

title: Talks in China: Kim Jong Un hugs Putin goodbye; vows to help with 'everything'
content: During bilateral talks in Beijing, Kim Jong Un pledged his full support to Vladimir Putin, expressing readiness to provide all possible assistance to Moscow. Putin praised North Korean soldiers' bravery, claiming they fought alongside Russian troops. Kim highlighted strengthened ties since last year's strategic partnership pact, considering support for Russia a "fraternal duty."

title: Raja Jackson under LAPD lens: Syko Stu links emerge; legal heat intensifies
content: Raja Jackson, son of MMA star Quinton “Rampage” Jackson, faces potential legal trouble after allegedly assaulting wrestler Syko Stu at a KnokX Pro Wrestling Academy event. The LAPD investigation is likely to be taken over by California state authorities. Syko Stu is now recovering from severe injuries, including head trauma and jaw fractures.

title: Slapgate scandal: Ex-cricketer blasts Lalit Modi for reviving Harbhajan-Sreesanth episode
content: Robin Uthappa has criticized Lalit Modi and Michael Clarke. They released a video of the 2008 IPL 'Slapgate' incident. The video showed Harbhajan Singh slapping S Sreesanth. Uthappa questioned the insensitivity of releasing the video. He highlighted potential racial double standards in cricket. He suggested similar incidents involving non-Indian players are often handled differently. He emphasized the need for empathy.

title: CBSE–NCB tie-up: 100 schools to pilot drug-free drive; 500+ teachers trained
content: CBSE and NCB have signed a Memorandum of Understanding to combat substance abuse in schools and promote a drug-free environment. The MoU outlines collaborative efforts such as awareness programmes, teacher training, counselling, and digital resources. A pilot programme will begin in 100 CBSE schools. Senior officials attended the event, followed by an awareness session for over 500 educators. This initiative aims to create a safe and supportive ecosystem for students across CBSE-affiliated schools in India.

title: FIDE Grand Swiss: Divya only Indian female in Open section; Gukesh in contention
content: The FIDE Grand Swiss 2025 in Samarkand will feature World Champion D Gukesh and Women’s World Cup winner Divya Deshmukh, alongside a strong Indian contingent. Gukesh aims to maintain momentum, while Deshmukh seeks to test herself against top players. With Candidates spots and significant prize money at stake, the tournament promises intense competition and a showcase of India's chess talent.

title: Individual Life And Health Insurance Policies To Be Exempt From GST
content: The GST on health and insurance products, which stood at 18 per cent, has been cut to zero, in a major revamp of the GST rate structure.

title: Toothpaste, Butter, Eraser: What Is Under 5% GST Or Is Now Exempt
content: The Goods and Services Tax Council, chaired by Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman, announced a major change that only two rates will remain from September 22 - 5 per cent and 18 per cent, eliminating the 12 per cent and 28 percent GST slabs.

title: GST Rates Revised: What Got Cheaper
content: The Goods and Services Tax (GST) Council announced today that only two rates will remain from September 22 - 5 per cent and 18 per cent.

title: TVs, ACs, Bikes Under 350 CC To Fall Under 18% GST Slab: Nirmala Sitharaman
content: The Goods and Services Tax (GST) Council announced today that only two rates will remain from September 22 - 5 per cent and 18 per cent.

title: TV Actor Ashish Kapoor Arrested In Pune Over Rape Allegation: Police
content: Television actor Ashish Kapoor was arrested by Delhi Police from Pune after a woman accused him of rape at a house party in the national capital, an officer said on Wednesday.

title: First, Tea And Biscuits. Then Lathis As Farmers Lock Officials Over Fertilizers
content: It is the season of sowing, but there's anger and despair across Madhya Pradesh. Farmers in several districts are facing a deepening fertilizer crisis.

title: Harish Rao Used Kaleswaram Funds For Election of 25 MLAs: K Kavitha
content: K Kavitha, resigning her party and legislative post after her suspension from the Bharat Rashtra Samithi, made a series of serious allegations today that have drawn a target on the back of her former party.

title: 17 Years On, Gangster Arun Gawli Leaves Jail After Bail In Murder Case
content: After spending more than 17 years behind bars, gangster-turned-politician Arun Gawli on Wednesday walked out of the Nagpur Central Jail days with the Supreme Court granting him bail in a 2007 murder case, officials said.

title: Pics: Fresh Rains Add To Misery In Flood-Hit Punjab, Schools Shut Till Sunday
content: A fresh spell of heavy rains compounded the flood situation in Punjab, which is battling its worst deluge since 1988, as all 23 districts of the state have been hit and 30 lives lost so far.

title: Congress MLA Defends "Delivery" Remark At Journalist, Refuses To Apologise
content: A day after he sparked a massive row with his tone-deaf reply to a woman journalist in Karnataka, he refused to apologise and said his comments were misinterpreted.

title: 2 Newborns Die In 2 Days After Rat Bites At Madhya Pradesh Hospital
content: A second newborn bitten by rats in Indore's Maharaja Yeshwantrao Hospital died on Wednesday afternoon. The infant, referred from Dewas, died barely a day after another baby girl from Khandwa met the same fate.

title: "Stop Singling Out India...": US Expert On Trump's Russia Oil Charges
content: US Strategic Affairs Expert Ashley J. Tellis said that the US should stop "singling out" India over President Donald Trump's frustration regarding the ongoing Russia-Ukraine conflict.

title: Sheena Bora Was With Rahul Mukerjea 2 Days After 'Murder': Sister To Court
content: Making a stunning claim in the ongoing Sheena Bora murder trial, key witness Vidhie Mukerjea on Wednesday told the court that Bora was with her boyfriend Rahul Mukerjea at least till April 26, 2012, which was two days after her alleged murder.

title: Yamuna Water Level In Flooded Delhi Rises To 207.41 Metres, 3rd-Highest Ever
content: The Yamuna river's water level in Delhi reached the third-highest ever recorded at 207.39 metres today, amid massive flooding on the riverbank which affected both residential and commercial areas.

title: 'Colonial Era Over... Can't Use This Tone': Putin Defends India Amid US Tariffs
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin cautioned against any nation trying to "dominate" global politics or security, even as he acknowledged the rise of "economic giants" such as India and China.

title: Capital Protection Force Chief Operating Officer Arrested In Rs 792 Crore Scam
content: The Enforcement Directorate (ED) has arrested Aryan Singh, Chief Operating Officer of Capital Protection Force Pvt Ltd, in connection with the Rs 792 crore Ponzi scheme disguised as an invoice discounting platform.

title: "They Eliminated Me... Will Do The Same To Brother, Father": K Kavitha
content: K Kavitha, hours after resigning from her father K Chandrasekhar Rao's Bharat Rashtra Samithi, told NDTV that it was her family and not she, who was being targetted.

title: "Not Like BJP...": Tejashwi Yadav On PM Hitting Out At Opposition Over Abuse
content: Rashtriya Janata Dal (RJD) leader Tejashwi Yadav has condemned the use of derogatory words on Prime Minister Narendra Modi's late mother during a joint RJD-Congress rally in Bihar.

title: Cabinet Approves Rs 1,500 Crore Scheme To Boost Critical Mineral Recycling
content: The Cabinet on Wednesday gave its go-ahead to a Rs 1,500 crore incentive scheme to promote the recycling of critical minerals in the country.

title: Fantasy baseball news: Tucker to sit for Cubs; Boston's Anthony leaves early
content: the fantasy baseball buzz file aims to provide fantasy managers with the intel they need as news breaks around baseball . the los Angeles Angels will reportedly call up Caden Dana to handle tonight's road start against the Kansas City Royals .

title: The mystery of Carlos Alcaraz
content: Carlos Alcaraz beats Jiri Lehecka 6-4, 6-2, 6-4 to reach the semifinals of the US Open . the two-time semifinalist was a favorite to win the title again . alcaraz responded to all of it with his signature good-natured humor .

title: Updated SP+ rankings for all 136 FBS teams
content: in a single sentence, it's a tempo- and opponent-adjusted measure of college football efficiency . it does not automatically give credit for big wins or particularly brave scheduling . early in the season, ratings are based primarily on preseason projections .

title: Way-Too-Early Top 25 rankings: Every team's top awards candidate
content: college basketball is just around the corner . it was another quiet month for college hoops . the top 25 from the July and August editions remains the same . we're focusing on one candidate from each Top 25 team .

title: 'Can sign deal with India': Trump leaves door open for New Delhi; presses for more
content: the frog that almost ‘dies’ every winter, but comes back to life . how to grow expensive lettuce for salad in balcony garden and the best time to sow it The rainbow of the wild: 10 colourful and rare insects across the globe .

title: Dog custody: Delhi HC's advise to Mahua, Dehadrai
content: the TOI News Desk comprises a dedicated and tireless team of journalists who operate around the clock to deliver the most current and comprehensive news and updates to the readers of The Times of India worldwide . the team is at the forefront of gathering, verifying, and presenting breaking news, in-depth analysis, and insightful reports .

title: 'Stay without passport': Big relief for minority migrants from these 3 nations
content: Bharti Jain is senior editor with the Times of India, new Delhi . she has been writing on security matters since 1996 . her repertoire of news stories delves into the whole gamut of issues related to terrorism and internal strife .

title: 'Not done Phase-2 or 3': Trump hints at more action against India
content: the TOI News Desk comprises a dedicated and tireless team of journalists who operate around the clock to deliver the most current and comprehensive news and updates to the readers of The Times of India worldwide . the team is at the forefront of gathering, verifying, and presenting breaking news, in-depth analysis, and insightful reports on a wide range of topics .

content: the TOI News Desk comprises a dedicated and tireless team of journalists who operate around the clock to deliver the most current and comprehensive news and updates to the readers of The Times of India worldwide . the team is at the forefront of gathering, verifying, and presenting breaking news, in-depth analysis, and insightful reports .

title: College football betting lines: Michigan heads to Oklahoma in ranked showdown
content: the Seminoles rose the highest in this week's AP Poll . Florida State beat Alabama as 13.5-point underdogs fall to no. 21 . only four conferences are represented in the poll, according to ESPN Research .

title: Why Dwight Howard absolutely belongs as a first-ballot Hall of Famer
content: dwight Howard will be enshrined in the Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame this weekend . as of 2021, Howard was one of 26 players in NBA history with at least five first-team All-NBA nods . the other 25 were named to the league's 75th Anniversary Team that year .

title: Survivor pool strategy: The top teams to take in NFL's Week 1
content: ESPN Eliminator Challenge is one of the easiest and most fun games to play this season . pick one team, and as long as they win (or tie), you advance to the next round . if they lose, you are out . the biggest favorites tend to win the most over the long run .

title: 'He's not trying to be a celebrity': How Justin Fields differs from Aaron Rodgers
content: a week 1 win means more for Justin Fields than for Aaron Rodgers, who is still building his career . he summoned the quarterback to new jersey and fired him in a meeting that turned contentious . "i respected it," one player said, reflecting on how he felt at the time .

title: Canelo, Crawford, Mayweather: Top 25 boxers of the century
content: two of the best fighters of this generation meet on sept. 13 at Allegiant Stadium in Las Vegas . undisputed super middleweight champion canelo Alvarez meets junior middleweight champ Terence Crawford . a list of 25 retired fighters to step into the ring has been put together by ESPN .

title: Maratha quota row: ‘Who are you to give Kunbi certificates,’ Bhujbal questions his own government
content: “This order will definitely affect the OBCs. I am in the process of taking legal consultation,” NCP leader Chhagan Bhujbal said; he also warned of a mass protest

title: ₹398 crore flyover project to ease east-west traffic congestion in Mehdipatnam
content: The flyover project in the area comes exactly 20 years after the conceptualisation of the PVNR Expressway that was completed in 2009 under a Congress government

title: Amit Shah asks Tamil Nadu BJP leaders to desist from commenting on OPS, Dhinakaran
content: The core group was asked to identify Assembly seats where the BJP might contest in alliance with the AIADMK in 2026, although no number was provided

title: DGCA proposes paid-assistance for air travellers to curb wheelchair misuse
content: Proposal part of draft norms placed for stakeholder consultations ahead of Bombay High Court hearing on September 25 after the court ordered an expert committee to examine the issue of wheelchair availability at airports

title: GST Council approves two-rate tax slab effective September 22
content: Govt retains 5% and 18% slabs; reforms carried out with focus on common man, says Finance Minister; products such as soap, shampoo, toothbrushes, bicycles may cost less with inclusion in 5% slab; States voice concerns over revenue shortfall

title: Reservation roster faces criticism for ‘favouring general category’
content: The new roster violates the guidelines and is against the roster announced in 2022, says Karnataka State SC/ST Government Employees Association president D. Chandrashekaraiah

title: In BJP’s Bihar huddle, discussions held on meetings with allies and countering Opposition on SIR
content: Discussions with NDA partners to be held in every Assembly seat over the next three weeks; Leaders to rally against offensive language aimed at PM’s mother

title: Dhinakaran exits NDA; Amit Shah asks T.N. BJP leaders to exercise restraint
content: T.T.V. Dhinakaran reiterated the AMMK had unconditionally joined the NDA during the 2024 Parliamentary elections only to ensure that Narendra Modi returned as Prime Minister for the third time

title: Centre issues guidelines to co-locate 11 lakh anganwadis on nearest school premises
content: Co-location eases transition from pre-school to primary school, aids curriculum alignment, community participation; so far, 2.9 lakh anganwadis have been co-located or mapped with schools with Class 1

title: Assam Jatiya Parishad protests extension of CAA deadline
content: The AJP termed the extension of the deadline as the “biggest crime” ever committed against Assamese people, and accused the Bharatiya Janata Party-led government of perpetuating historical injustice

title: Navarro’s ‘Brahmin’ remarks reflect utter ignorance: Suhag A. Shukla
content: Rather than basing his arguments for tariffs on logic or sound reasoning, he’s showing a preference towards sycophancy combined with racist colonial stereotypes, says HAF Executive Director

title: CJI upholds dignity as the soul of the Constitution, and a cohesive force
content: The Supreme Court has intervened to declare human dignity as a ‘Constitutional value that remains inviolable, even within the confines of incarceration’, the CJI said

title: Tejashwi Yadav hits back at PM, says his remarks on mother’s insult a ‘dikhawati’
content: The RJD leader questions timing of Prime Minster’s remarks, says he was laughing when abroad but began speaking about the insult to his mother once he returned to India

title: NHRC issues notice to Punjab government over reports of stray dog seen carrying baby’s head near Patiala government hospital
content: Citing media reports, NHRC says patient attendants alleged poor sanitation, negligence, but medical superintendent says no baby missing from hospital; Punjab Chief Secy, police asked to report in two weeks

title: India killed U.S. with tariffs, now offers ‘no tariffs’: Trump
content: Donald Trump said he “understood tariffs better than any human being in the world” and with his tariffs, the other countries “were all dropping them”

title: Big relief: 0% GST on individual health, life insurance; reduced from 18%
content: the TOI Business Desk is a vigilant and dedicated team of journalists committed to delivering the latest and most relevant business news from around the world to readers of the Times of India . the desk ensures that TOI readers are well-informed about the ever-changing and dynamic world of commerce .

title: Another landslide strikes Mata Vaishno Devi shrine; debris blocks route
content: the TOI News Desk comprises a dedicated and tireless team of journalists who operate around the clock to deliver the most current and comprehensive news and updates to the readers of The Times of India worldwide . the team is at the forefront of gathering, verifying, and presenting breaking news, in-depth analysis, and insightful reports .

title: 'It will end!' Trump's ultimatum to Hamas; demands immediate release of all hostages
content: seasoned journalists and passionate writers tirelessly sift through the vast tapestry of global events to bring you the latest news and diverse perspectives round the clock . we strive to keep you informed about the ever-evolving world, providing a nuanced understanding of international affairs to our readers .

title: Piqued Trump accuses Xi of conspiring against US as China parade stuns world
content: Rajghatta is author of Kamala Harris: Phenomenal Woman In life and 'death': The frog that almost ‘dies’ every winter, but comes back to life How to grow expensive lettuce for salad in balcony garden and the best time to sow it The rainbow of the wild: 10 colourful and rare insects across the globe Mixing this one ingredient in your Mehendi can give your hair a natural black colour 10 freshwater aquarium fish that grow too big for small tanks Shweta Tiwari’s top 10 ultra-glam looks that prove she’s aging in reverse Saree Diaries: Nivetha Pethuraj’s traditional style turns heads Rashami Desai’s Festive Glam in Ethnic Elegance Saiee Manjrekar stuns in dazzling evening attire Eight safest SUVs with five star safety rating by BNCAP: Maruti Victoris, Punch, and more

title: Karnataka High Court declines to interfere with policy for compulsory use of 20% jute bags for packing sugar
content: A judge cannot assume the role of ‘super adviser’, says the court; It is for standing advisory committee to examine whether jute batching oil causes serious health hazards, it adds

title: Ramanagar sends the message of harmony, as Christians and Muslims join Ganeshotsav
content: For the last four years, along with Hindus, Christians and Muslims have been actively involving themselves in rituals during the celebrations

title: Aged petitioner pulled up for demanding acknowledgement at Ungaludan Stalin camp
content: Revenue officials refused to give an acknowledgement as the man had been petitioning various authorities on the same issue many times earlier; video of an SI hitting the petitioner went viral across social media platforms

title: Onam celebrations: security bolstered in State capital
content: A force of nearly 1,200 police personnel will be deployed across various event venues and public spaces during the course of the festivities

title: Denial of bail to Khalid, others a travesty of justice, bid to silence dissent: Left parties
content: The CPI (M) said that no action has been taken against BJP leaders Kapil Mishra and Anurag Thakur, whose alleged “incendiary speeches actually fuelled the same Delhi communal riots”

title: Kerala HC seeks clarity on Global Ayyappa Sangamam
content: The devaswom board’s counsel informs the court that the event is being organised exclusively by the TDB and that the State government was only offering support for crowd management

title: GST Council meet: Jammu and Kashmir CM Abdullah seeks central support for terror-hit economy
content: Omar Abdullah highlighted the devastating impact of the event on the UT’s economy and called for the Centre’s support to deal with the situation, particularly in view of the proposed GST rate rationalisation

title: OBC leaders threaten stir against GR on Maratha quota; Bhujbal to move court
content: OBC leaders intensify opposition to Maharashtra’s GR granting Kunbi certificates to Marathas; Minister Chhagan Bhujbal says he will challenge it legally even as the Bombay High Court directs Manoj Jarange Patil to clarify his stand on property damage

title: Minister slams NHAI officials for poor NH-16 road works
content: The 70-kilometer-long highway is being laid by Mumbai-based Safeway Projects Private Limited under the Toll, Operate and Tax (TOT) mode.

title: Kill, sell, or translocate excess wild animals, says CPI farmers’ forum
content: In a letter to Forest Minister, All India Kisan Sabha blaming the Forest department for the increasing incursion of wild elephants into human habitations. The letter calls for expediting reforestation efforts

title: Nellore district to restore 220 minor irrigation ponds with ₹355 crore: Collector
content: About 26,928 hectares of land will be developed through the Repair, Renovation, and Restoration scheme, says O. Anand

title: Telangana opens doors for microbreweries
content: The initiative is expected to give organisations an opportunity to apply for licences and set up units in the Telangana Core Urban Region and six municipal corporations — Karimnagar, Nizamabad, Khammam, Mahabubnagar, Adilabad and Warangal

title: Karnataka Police gears up to fill large vacancies over next two years
content: With the internal reservation matrix approved by the State Cabinet last week, the State police to restart recruitment

title: ONGC, GAIL, Vedanta face ‘road ban’ threat
content: These companies were given a deadline to come up with an action plan by October end; Next round of talks will be held in early October.

title: MLA Deshpande draws flak over response to woman journalist’s question on childbirth
content: Karnataka Union of Working Journalists demands that the Veteran Congress leader tender an apology; BJP State Women Morcha to hold a protest in Uttara Kannada district on Thursday

title: CCTV footage shows police officers assaulting Youth Congress leader in station
content: After years-long delay, SIC orders release of footage showing SI and CPOs thrashing V.S. Sujith on April 5, 2023

title: Expedite RE projects in alignment with CTUIL timelines, Andhra Pradesh Energy Minister Gottipati Ravi Kumar tells Axis Energy and Suzlon companies
content: Assuring the companies of all support to facilitate their timely commissioning, he stresses the need for generating local employment

title: Vigilance raids unearth widespread collusion between excise officials, bar hotel owners in State
content: Raids reveal that excise officials have been accepting bribes in cash, liquor bottles and digital payments from bar and liquor shop owners

title: Total lunar eclipse on the intervening night of Sept. 7 and 8
content: Jawaharlal Nehru Planetarium is organising demonstration lectures about the eclipse late in the evening of September 7

title: CM promises basic facilities for pilgrims visiting Anjanadri Hill in Koppal
content: Siddaramaiah says that only ₹10 crore has been released so far, though ₹200 crore was earmarked for the purpose

title: Corporatised ordnance factories post record ₹3,500-crore export orders in 2024-25
content: Since October 2021, when 41 Ordnance Factory Board units were reorganised into seven entities, six of the companies have posted profits

title: Trader booked for selling fertilizers at higher price in Kurnool district
content: Police inspect Sri Lakshmi fertilizer shop in Jain Doddi and verify stocks and bill books, which throw light that the owner has been selling fertilizers at more than the MRP

title: Ahead of Onam, demand for air tickets from West Asia to Kerala dips
content: The unusual trend is attributed to the festival season not coinciding with the school vacation in the Gulf. This time, schools reopen after Onam and hence the return air fare to the West Asia has shot up

title: INS Trikand reaches Egypt to join multilateral drill Bright Star 2025
content: During her port call at Alexandria, the Indian naval stealth frigate will engage in professional and cultural exchanges, including meetings with senior military officials, cross-deck visits, sports events, and cultural activities aimed at deepening bilateral and multilateral ties

title: Three killed, 22 injured as vehicle hits visarjan procession in Chhattisgarh
content: The incident, caused allegedly by an inebriated driver of an SUV, was reported in Jurudand village in Jashpur district on Tuesday night

title: ⬇️ Bottom 10: Bama isn't the only Power 4 stinker
content: Rich Eisen shares his thoughts with Stephen A. Smith on bill Belichick's coaching debut with UNC . "merrimack county," Tom Rush Here at Bottom 10 Headquarters, located beside a roulette table in Tahoe . the Warriors went and upset the bottom 10 cosmic balance during college football's opening weekend, like Thanos snapping his fingers .

title: Life on the WNBA fringe: Suitcases, sacrifice, soul-searching
content: haley Jones reserved a drawer for her gear for her Atlanta Dream gear . she cleared out two more drawers for two more teams . there's 3:42 to go in the game, and Dallas is down 76-74 with six seconds on the shot clock .

title: Ready for Week 1, the Browns are stocked with young talent, a reshaped QB room and an energized Myles Garrett
content: shedeur Sanders' final preseason performance could doom his chances of playing in the regular season . he says he'd never wear an all-brown suit again . the decor was a nod to Garrett's love for the prehistoric animals .
